illim dina nogenama bas warjanaya athahari eeye dawasa pura janathawata pida athi karamin rata pura pawathwagena giya wada warjanaya madiyam rathriya wanawita athhara damannata eyata mulwu bas sangam thiranaya kara atha. 25000 dada panawamin ayawaya magin athi kala dada sanshodhana iwathkaraganna lesa balakaramin thakkali prahara gal prahara kunuharupa - warjana nokala ayata than than waladi dun danduwam thakkali prahara gal prahara kunuharupa warjana nokala ayata than than waladi dun danduwam ada diwayina pura pawathina pudgalika bas ratha warjanaya janathawage paththen balawath apahasutha athikarawa thibena athare ema warjanayata sahaya pala nokarana bas ratha, thri roda ratha saha dumriyata erehiwa warjakayin wisin prahara diyath kala awastha rashiyak warthawi thibe.
